item.title: By: mimoYmima
item.dc:creator: mimoYmima
item.description: we didn't include any design in the actual templates because we figured it'd get in the way and you'd just need to delete it every time, thanks for the compliments!
item.content:encoded: we didn’t include any design in the actual templates because we figured it’d get in the way and you’d just need to delete it every time, thanks for the compliments!

item.title: By: Chris Tome
item.dc:creator: Chris Tome
item.description: Thanks a lot for these great templates! Would love to see one with a design of yours in it to compare sizes of image boxes, fonts, etc. Thanks again and keep up the great work!
item.content:encoded: Thanks a lot for these great templates! Would love to see one with a design of yours in it to compare sizes of image boxes, fonts, etc. Thanks again and keep up the great work!
